শুভ জন্মদিন

(HAPPY BIRTHDAY)

My Happiness

প্রিয় অর্পিতা

We have meet you by Luck

After meeting you everthing in my Life

started change in a very good way.

We have shared So much memories and

created some presious one.

Either it was going to office with you

or taking to you whole night.

you have made my Life more beautiful.

Fortunet to have you in my life.

 

Happy Birthday, Beautiful!

♥Rohit

Your Sweetheart
